org.springframework.mock.web

Class MockExpressionEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.el.ExpressionEvaluator
      • org.springframework.mock.web.MockExpressionEvaluator

  • public class MockExpressionEvaluator
extends ExpressionEvaluator
    Mock implementation of the JSP 2.0 ExpressionEvaluator interface, delegating to the Apache JSTL ExpressionEvaluatorManager. Only necessary for testing applications when testing custom JSP tags.

    Note that the Apache JSTL implementation (jstl.jar, standard.jar) has to be available on the classpath to use this expression evaluator.

    Since:
    1.1.5
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    ExpressionEvaluatorManager
